title: WILL THE PBE SIGN UP EVER BE UP AGAIN
body: the pbe sign up site has been down for 4 mouths when will it be up again? Really want to know.

replies.body: We still don't have an exact date on when the signups will be open again, but you can be sure to be the first to know by periodically checking up on our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) and the [**PBE status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
